metadata.title: CVE-2021-47486 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:riscv, bpf: Fix potential NULL dereferenceThe bpf_jit_binary_free() function requires a non-NULL argument. Whenthe RISC-V BPF JIT fails to converge in NR_JIT_ITERATIONS steps,jit_data->header will be NULL, which triggers a NULLdereference. Avoid this by checking the argument, prior calling thefunction.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
